data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Darién to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Darién, Panama
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 10,447 believers in the state of Darién to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Darién, Panama.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Darién words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Darién who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, convict the 10,447 believers in Darién to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Darién, Panama.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Darién, Panama has a population of 48,400.

We estimate Darién has 10,447 people who might know Jesus, 32,241 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,712 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Darién to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...
